text: João Ferreira may refer to: * Bigode (João Ferreira, 1922–2003), Brazilian footballer * João Augusto Ferreira de Almeida (1873–1917), executed Portuguese soldier * João Ferreira (politician) (born 1978), Portuguese politician * João Ferreira (hurdler) (born 1986), Portuguese athlete * João Ferreira (footballer) (born 2001), Portuguese footballer
title: João Ferreira
